subject: NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Maintenance /2020 No. 18.43/2020 dated 27th April; 2020 reg Maintenance of NHs
text: HRal 77y  TTHrf xifedrut 3H14 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (sm #Rar7 3 <THf AA1c4) 444 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) vit-5 & 6, Vaer-10, ERTT, 78 feri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Maintenance /2020 No. 18.43/2020 dated 27th April, 2020 Subject: Maintenance of NHs For maintenance of NHs entrusted to NHAI, delegation has been given to the field units from time to time_ Latest Policy Circular in this regard was issued on 15.04.2020. 2 _ During the video conferencing of Chairman on "Patchless Roads held on 21.04.2020, a doubt has been raised whether delegated powers of the Reginal Officers can be utilized, when the maintenance is carried out through the State PWD ? 3 In the above context; it is clarified that the delegation given will apply for maintenance carried out through State PWDs also, so long as RO satisfies himself that the maintenance cost is within the norms of the Ministry. 271 (V.K. Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord) All Officers at HQROs/ PIUs / CMUs/ Site Offices. (MT R M 4 NHAL
